entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 4 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. High minus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
